fields.headline: Coffin Rock
fields.bodyText: This Australian thriller, a late addition to the "cuckoo in the nest" cycle of the late 1980s, is virtually Fatal Attraction transposed to a small fishing town in South Australia. A desperate housewife has a fling with a young, psychopathic Irish stalker, who pursues her when she becomes pregnant. Murky, predictable, but well enough played.
